content: अण(न)क {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अणति यथेच्छं नदति, अण्-अच् कुत्सायां कन् च] Very small, contemptible, mean, insignificant, wretched; पापाणके कुत्सितैः <ls>P. II. 1. 54</ls>; <ab>oft.</ab> in <ab>comp.</ab> in the sense of deterioration or contempt; °कुलालः <ls>Sk.</ls> a contemptible potter. --कः A kind of bird.
